web_snippets: Amy Grant is a Grammy-winning singer-songwriter who came up in the Christian music industry and became a crossover pop success. She's married to Vince Gill.
Amy Grant was born on November 25, 1960, in Augusta, Georgia, USA, the youngest of four daughters to Dr. Burton Paine Grant and his wife Gloria.
Amy Grant is an American music icon who has erased lines between genres and earned the respect of fans and peers with her honesty, vulnerability and ceaseless ...
